cast.name: 马塞尔·尤勒斯 Marcel Iures
麦迪尔玛瑞尼斯库 Medeea Marinescu
赛尔邦·约内斯库 Serban Ionescu
米尔卡·迪亚科努 Mircea Diaconu
霍拉丘·默勒埃莱 Horaţiu Mălăele

introduction: A class reunion. After 20 years, former high school coelgi merges, festive, at a villa in Snagov. Before 1989 he belonged to the family Ceausescu; now it's owned by a boss who has control of a powerful media group, which includes TV and STAR. The meeting is incorporated in a commercial program for Bita, son of manager at the trust, is the former star of the class and also the main shareholder in STAR TV. And the main snitch - during high school - from security to Mihai Nica, purest souls of all people, has suffered and then emigrated to the US. Michael is now an acclaimed journalist and writer in the States and came to visit in Romania. Home TV promo peruse through a class meeting to which he was not invited. Goes unbidden, access is denied, but manages to slip. Participating in a talk show that is humbled by filmmaker and along with his driver and another former colleague (Peter painter in France, suffering from advanced cancer) withdraws from the masquerade.
